newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Ossia gets approval for Singapore share listing.
newsitem.headline: Ossia gets approval for Singapore share listing.

text.p: Clothing and footwear wholesaler and distributor Ossia International Pte Ltd said on Tuesday it had received in-principle approval to list its shares on the main board of the Stock Exchange of Singapore (SES).
An Ossia statement said its initial public offering (IPO) of shares would be lead managed by Overseas Union Bank Ltd. It did not say when the IPO would be launched.
The SES usually requires companies to list within a couple of months of approval being granted.
The statement gave no other details of the IPO.
Ossia distributes a variety of brands of designer clothing and sportswear to department stores and shops in 20 countries across Asia, Europe, the Middle East and Africa, it said.
